title: Did an article in 1922 counsel that Hitler was not concerned about anti - Semitism?
subtitle: An early New York Times report on Adolf Hitler misjudged the ferocity of anti-Semitism.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: According to an article published in The New York Times in 1922, Adolf Hitler "was merely using anti-Semitic propaganda as a bait to catch crowds of followers."
